site.title: Ben Young
site.description: A blog where I can share my thoughts and insights on the ever-evolving world of Veeam, technology, enterprise strategy, and the fascinating intersection of automation and AI. Expect in-depth analysis, practical advice, and a dose of real-world experience from a seasoned tech professional.

metadata.meta_description: Field CTO, APJ @ Veeam and 5x Veeam Vanguard. Sharing my thoughts on technology and showcasing the art of the possible.

author.name: Ben Young
author.bio: Field CTO, APJ @ Veeam and 5x Veeam Vanguard. Sharing my thoughts on technology and showcasing the art of the possible.
